text: (Napiye!) Umatu manaivikalil nir virumpiyavarkalai (virumpiya kalam varai) vilakki vaikkalam; nir virumpiyavarkalai (virumpiya kalam varai) um'mutan irukka vaikkalam. Nir vilakkiyavarkalil nir virumpiyavarkalai um'mutan certtuk kollalam. (Ivarraip parri) um mitu oru kurramumillai. Avarkalutaiya kankal kulirntiruppatarkum nir avarkalukkuk kotuttavarraip parri avarkal anaivarume tiruptiyataintu kavalaippatatiruppatarkum itu mikka culapamana valiyaka irukkiratu. Unkal ullankalil ullavarrai allah nankarivan. Allah (anaittaiyum) nankarintavanaka, porumaiyutaiyavanaka irukkiran
